PocketMine.description:
MineCraft: Pocket Edition Server.

Based on a custom docker image: https://hub.docker.com/r/magicalyak/pocketmine, available for amd64 architecture only.
PocketMine.more_info:
Administration

use the command line and run docker attach pocketmine, type help for options. press control-p, control-q to exit without stopping container

19132.description: Port for incoming and discovery broadcasts. You may need to open it (protocol: tcp/udp) on your firewall.
